Site set up
Privacy Notice

Site set up

Selected hospital sites in the UK are established to recruit cases to ISARIC 4C. To set up your site, contact the study team at CCP@liverpool.ac.uk

You can view the up-to-date versions of the study protocols below.

If you are set up and ready to go, please have a look at the virtual site visit.
